sentences.en: a product of her febrile imagination
Burn patients are febrile before there is sinificant bacterial colonization of born wound.
sentences.cn: 烧伤病人在伤口有显著的细菌集落生长以前就可以发热.

sentences.en: But in febrile, partisan Washington that is a pipe - dream.
sentences.cn: 但是在狂热 、 盲从的华盛顿,这只是一种妄想.

sentences.en: Cloudy swelling is seen in febrile infectious diseases and metallic poisoning.
sentences.cn: 混浊肿胀见于热性传染病和金属中毒.

sentences.en: Crimean - Congo hemorrhagic fever was then diagnosed as febrile diseases.
sentences.cn: “克罗米亚 - 刚果出血热”在当时被认作“伤寒”.

sentences.en: He ran a febrile course with an average temperature of 39� � C.
sentences.cn: 在发烧期间,他的平均体温是摄氏39度.

sentences.en: He was obliguric and feverish ( febrile ) throughout the course.
sentences.cn: 他在患病期间尿量减少,并且发烧.

sentences.en: Immunisation should be postponed in patients with febrile illness or acute infection.
sentences.cn: 如注射当日有发烧,或急性感染的情况,请于病愈后接受注射.

sentences.en: It's that inflammed right ear, you know. It's a febrile episode.
sentences.cn: 就是这个发炎的右耳朵引起的, 你知道, 这是并发症.

sentences.en: Seasonal febrile disease, severe palpitation, chest bi - syndrome and consumptive disease.
sentences.cn: 中医属温病 、 怔忡 、 胸痹、虚劳等范畴.

sentences.en: Some children with acute pharyngitis complain of abdominal pain and are febrile.
sentences.cn: 有些患急性咽炎的小儿诉说腹痛且有发热.

sentences.en: The whole place exhaled the febrile bustle of the saloon on a holiday morning.
sentences.cn: 整个地方都弥漫着一片假日早晨酒店里那种热火朝天的气氛.

sentences.en: There's a febrile atmosphere round the world trade community.
sentences.cn: 全球贸易领域高度紧张.

sentences.en: This antipyretic action is usually rapid and effective in febrile patients.
sentences.cn: 对发热病人,这种退热作用通常迅速有效.

sentences.en: Toxic doses can produce a febrile effect.
sentences.cn: 中毒剂量可产生发热作用.

trans.tran_en: full of nervous excitement or activity
